page.title: 01STOKE DOYLE BLOCK SUMMARY.
page.content: The Stoke Doyle block is south_west of{Oundle},north of Wadenhoe and west of the River Nene. There is only one village in this block and it is mainly used by arable farmers. The main leisure activities in the Stoke Doyle block are The Golf Course and{Barnwell {Country Picnic Park}, although both are nearer to Oundle than they are to Stoke Doyle.{Oundle Marina}could perhaps be counted as a leisure facility, but it houses one of the major international boat building companies in the country,Fairline. The area is mainly agricultural. There are three major farms in Stoke Doyle- Howhill, Churchfield and Seven Wells. Also there are two fairly small pieces of woodland.
